name: The Friendly Wizard Azar
description:
The Friendly Wizard Azar

A 3D game on rails where the Azar tries to grow his wizard heart by navigating through varied terrain and obstacles in the hopes of collecting materials, to give to those in need. The more he gives the bigger his heart gets and the harder it is to accumulate the material.

Instructions

Press the space bar to navigate through the terrain, if you get stuck refresh the game! Try to avoid the barriers, death traps, and spaces in order to advance through all 3 levels.

Press 'n' If you wish to skip through levels.
